meanings.definition: A brush used for cleaning under the fingernails.
meanings.sent1: I bought new nailbrushes to keep my nails clean.
meanings.sent2: She used the nailbrushes to scrub the dirt from under her nails.
meanings.sent3: The nailbrushes danced around in the sink, eager to clean.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers felt like they needed tiny nailbrushes to scrub away the worries.
meanings.sent5: The nailbrushes worked tirelessly, ensuring every nail was spotless.

meanings.definition: Brushes used for cleaning under the fingernails.
meanings.sent1: The nailbrushes in the bathroom are for everyone to use.
meanings.sent2: After gardening, she reached for the nailbrushes to remove the soil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the nailbrushes off the table.
meanings.sent4: His words were like gentle nailbrushes, cleaning away her doubts.
meanings.sent5: The nailbrushes stood ready, waiting to tackle any dirt under the nails.
